title: It's like Garamond, but it's not
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-3_6184.jpg)

I'm having a stupid day (again).

It's so obvious I'm ashamed, but I can't quite put my finger on it. Berthold Garamond is screaming at me but I know it's not.

TIA for the help, all.
author: Jordan Harper

comments.content:
Ooh.

[Utopia Semibold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113417/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125709.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=Cataract+surgery&sampleSize=32) looks awfully close.

Good work Renko.
